Nuxt Kit provides a set of utilities to help you work with the builder. These functions allow you to extend the webpack and vite configurations.
. You can extend the config passed to each one using
functions. You can also add additional plugins via
Extends the webpack configuration. Callback function can be called multiple times, when applying to both client and server builds.
language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme-lighter material-theme-palenight

function extendWebpackConfig (callback: ((config: WebpackConfig) => void), options?: ExtendWebpackConfigOptions): void

export interface ExtendWebpackConfigOptions {
  dev?: boolean
  build?: boolean
  server?: boolean
  client?: boolean
  prepend?: boolean
}
Checkout webpack website for more information about its configuration.
A callback function that will be called with the webpack configuration object.
Options to pass to the callback function. This object can have the following properties:
, the callback function will be called when building in development mode.
, the callback function will be called when building in production mode.
, the callback function will be called when building the server bundle.
, the callback function will be called when building the client bundle.
, the callback function will be prepended to the array with
Extends the Vite configuration. Callback function can be called multiple times, when applying to both client and server builds.

function extendViteConfig (callback: ((config: ViteConfig) => void), options?: ExtendViteConfigOptions): void

export interface ExtendViteConfigOptions {
  dev?: boolean
  build?: boolean
  server?: boolean
  client?: boolean
  prepend?: boolean
}
Checkout Vite website for more information about its configuration.
A callback function that will be called with the Vite configuration object.
Append webpack plugin to the config.

function addWebpackPlugin (pluginOrGetter: PluginOrGetter, options?: ExtendWebpackConfigOptions): void

type PluginOrGetter = WebpackPluginInstance | WebpackPluginInstance[] | (() => WebpackPluginInstance | WebpackPluginInstance[])

interface ExtendWebpackConfigOptions {
  dev?: boolean
  build?: boolean
  server?: boolean
  client?: boolean
  prepend?: boolean
}
for more information about webpack plugins. You can also use
to find a plugin that suits your needs.
A webpack plugin instance or an array of webpack plugin instances. If a function is provided, it must return a webpack plugin instance or an array of webpack plugin instances.
Append Vite plugin to the config.

function addVitePlugin (pluginOrGetter: PluginOrGetter, options?: ExtendViteConfigOptions): void

type PluginOrGetter = VitePlugin | VitePlugin[] | (() => VitePlugin | VitePlugin[])

interface ExtendViteConfigOptions {
  dev?: boolean
  build?: boolean
  server?: boolean
  client?: boolean
  prepend?: boolean
}
for more information about Vite plugins. You can also use
A Vite plugin instance or an array of Vite plugin instances. If a function is provided, it must return a Vite plugin instance or an array of Vite plugin instances.
. It will add the plugin to both webpack and vite configurations if they are present.
A factory function that returns an object with
properties. These properties must be functions that return a Vite plugin instance or an array of Vite plugin instances and/or a webpack plugin instance or an array of webpack plugin instances.

Nuxt Kit provides a set of utilities to help you work with logging. These functions allow you to log messages with extra features.
Examples of Nuxt Kit utilities in use.
